CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
JUDGES: András Sajó;Egidijus Kūris;Jon Fridrik Kjølbro;Nebojša Vučinić;Paul Lemmens;Robert Spano
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in LOC .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted civil proceedings against GPE concerning a plot of land .
CARDINAL . Following a remittal , on DATE ORG ( PERSON ) in GPE ruled partly in favour of the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( PERSON ) in GPE upheld a part of this judgment but quashed the remainder .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed at the same time a request for reopening of the proceedings with ORG and an appeal on points of law ( revizija ) with ORG ( PERSON ) , both in respect of the part of the judgment which had been upheld .
CARDINAL . On DATE the case - file was transmitted to ORG , which court returned the case - file to ORG on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG Instance dismissed the applicant ’s request for reopening of the proceedings , which decision was upheld by ORG on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s appeal on points of law .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG joined the examination of the remainder of the applicant ’s claim with other CARDINAL claims previously lodged by the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed another submission to the court , in view of the joined proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant specified his claim , in substance repeating his earlier submissions .

CARDINAL . On DATE the hearing started anew given that the case had been assigned to a new judge . The applicant notified the court that he was withdrawing his submission of DATE . The court invited the applicant to specify his claim , which the applicant did DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the hearing started anew given that the case had been assigned to a new judge .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG Instance declared it lacked competence to deal with the case ( sud se oglašava nenadležnim ) and rejected the claim . On an unspecified date thereafter this decision was quashed by ORG and in DATE the proceedings were again pending before ORG .
CARDINAL . DATE the parties attempted to reach a friendly settlement but to no avail .
CARDINAL . On DATE the hearing started afresh given that the case had been assigned to another judge .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ruled against the applicant , which decision was quashed by ORG on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG again ruled against the applicant . This judgment was upheld by ORG and ORG on DATE and DATE respectively .

CARDINAL . In DATE and DATE the applicant proposed that another set of civil proceedings be suspended ( prekid postupka ) until the proceedings initiated upon the claim lodged in DATE were concluded . On DATE the applicant proposed that this other set of proceedings be continued .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted another set of civil proceedings , which are currently pending before ORG .
